channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Icahn's Firm Seeks Bigger Stake in Top Holding While Slashing its Own Dividend
item.description: To fund a bigger war chest, Icahn Enterprises plans to halve dividend payout.

item.title: Currency Markets Pick Up on Powell's Hawkish Remarks
item.description: The dollar strengthened as currency markets picked up on hawkish overtones from the Fed chair on Thursday, BBH said. Commerzbank sees the dollar as ha...

item.title: U.S. Stocks Inch Higher as Strong Week Nears End
item.description: Stock indexes inched higher with the S&P 500 and the Dow industrials on track to deliver their best weekly performances in a year.

item.title: I’m 67, married and have two mortgages worth $660,000. Should I use my 401(k) to pay them off?
item.description: “I want to have $6,000 a month in cash to live comfortably and travel upon retirement.”

item.title: After Trump victory, ‘DJT’ shares resume rally while Phunware slides
item.description: In a post on Truth Media, Donald Trump said he has no intention of selling his shares in the social-media platform.

item.title: Metal Prices Fall as U.S. Dollar Gains Strength
item.description: Base metal prices, including copper and aluminum, were down against a stronger dollar.

item.title: SoFi’s stock climbs, with these twin engines carrying the rally further
item.description: Upstart’s upbeat lending results could be giving SoFi investors more optimism, according to a Mizuho analyst.

item.title: Green Thumb Industries looks past ‘tricky time’ for cannabis stocks as the company notches another profit
item.description: Green Thumb’s Ben Kovler says the big drop in canna stocks this week isn’t causing the Chicago-based company to change course.

item.title: What to Buy If the Election Has You Worrying About Inflation
item.description: Tax cuts, tariffs and the deportation of immigrants could crank inflation up again. Inflation-protected securities can protect your portfolio.

item.title: Carl Icahn’s investment arm’s stock slides after company again halves dividend
item.description: Icahn Enterprises LP’s stock fell 7% early Friday, after a report that Carl Icahn’s investing arm is planning to cut its dividend to help raise the fu...
